ing: 1/2 cup dry sherry (such as fino or amontillado)
1/4 cup fresh raspberries and/or blackberries, for garnish
des: "Probably invented in the 1830s when the 'frozen water trade' was just hitting its stride. A very refreshing summer drink when the berries are in season."
ins: Put sugar and water into a cocktail shaker and stir to dissolve. Add orange slices to the shaker and pour in sherry. Fill with ice, shake well, and strain into a tall glass full of crushed ice. Garnish with seasonal berries and a fresh slice of orange.
